lead_paragraph: Between a terror attack on the Togolese team in January and a FIFA scandal in December, Spain (and Barcelona) reigned over the year in soccer.
snippet: Between a terror attack on the Togolese team in January and a FIFA scandal in December, Spain (and Barcelona) reigned over the year in soccer.
